Description: His master went far in pursuit of a cigar.
LevelDescriptionText: $Grand Geode -> 大晶洞$1|A dejected youth, headed for the Grand Geode~2|A recovering youth, headed for the Grand Geode
ChangeDescriptionText: $Grand Geode -> 大晶洞$1|You have agreed to transport the Dogged Apprentice to the Grand Geode.
Name: Rosegate: The Dogged Apprentice
